articles.author: Cameron Salerno
articles.title: Indiana throttles Alabama: Hoosiers leave no doubt en route to CFP semifinal berth vs. Oregon - CBS Sports
articles.description: Indiana looked every bit the part of a No. 1 seed in a dominant victory over Alabama in the Rose Bowl College Football Playoff quarterfinal
articles.content: PASADENA, Calif. -- No. 1 Indiana made a statement Thursday in the College Football Playoff quarterfinals at the Rose Bowl, rolling to a 38-3 win over No. 9 Alabama. The Hoosiers will face No. 5 Oreg… [+4122 chars]
